page.title: 05Homelife in Irvine.
page.content: There have been a lot of{changes}in the home. We interviewed three {housewives.}One of the housewives had been a housewife for fifty years.She brought us in two old irons and a scrubbing board.We all had questions to ask the three ladies.Only one of them has a{dishwasher.}One of the helpful changes was an{automatic {washing machine.}A modern iron is much easier to handle too.The old gas iron was very heavy to carry and was very dangerous.A{vacuum cleaner}is much easier to clean the carpets than before when you used to have to bend down and use a brush and pan.Houses are more comfortable now with{central {heating}and{double glazing.
